Text:
Best copy that I've seen. Has 1 spot where it's not english, but it only lasts a few seconds and is hardly noticeable.
Thanks TVTEAM

Audio is awful and doesn't sound like a true 5.1 mix to me.

Video ok though.

Gave up after 5 mins. Will wait for better.
Do not agree with mcr_iron. Sound is just fine! Dont know if it is true 5.1 but it sounds quite good. This is by far the best copy out there, an excellent R5

BIG zero on the sound.
Mcr_iron is quite right. It's Ac3 but the front channels are all mixed up and no sound from the rear channels.
